title: Bonds of auctions
context: §437-21.1 Bonds of auctions. The bond of an auction shall be in the same amount and under the same terms and conditions as required for a new motor vehicle dealer in accordance with rules adopted by the motor vehicle industry licensing board. [L 1969, c 263, §1(17); am L 1971, c 137, §1; am L 1989, c 299, §2; am L 1996, c 264, §6]
